source.11897cd0:
def ing(verb):
    if verb == "be":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] == "x":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] == "r":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-2:] == "ip":
        ing = verb + "ping"
    elif verb[-1] == "p":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] == "w":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] == "l":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb in modal_verbs:
        ing = verb
    elif verb[-2:] == "oy":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-2:] == "ay":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-2:] == "ye":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-2:] == "ie":
        ing = verb[:-2] + "ying"
    elif verb[-2:] == "ee":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-2:] == "oe":
        ing = verb + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] == "e":
        ing = verb[:-1] + "ing"
    elif verb[-1] == "c":
        ing = verb + "king"
    elif not is_vowel(verb[-1]) and is_vowel(verb[-2]) and not is_vowel(verb[-3]):
        ing = verb + verb[-1] + "ing"
    else:
        ing = verb + "ing"
    return ing

def thirdps(verb):
    if verb in modal_verbs:
        thrsg = verb
    elif verb == "be":
        thrsg = "is"
    elif verb == "have":
        thrsg = "has"
    elif verb[-2:] == "oy":
        thrsg = verb + "s"
    elif verb[-2:] == "ay":
        thrsg = verb + "s"
    elif verb[-1] == "o":
        verb = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "x":
        verb = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "s":
        verb = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "z":
        verb = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "h":
        verb = verb + "es"
    elif verb[-1] == "y":
        verb = verb[0:-1] + "ies"
    else:
        thrsg = verb + "s"
    return thrsg

def ed1(verb):
    if verb in modal_verbs:
        ed = verb
    elif verb in irreg_verbs:
        ed = irreg_verbs[verb][0]
    elif verb[-2:] == "oy":
        ed = verb + "ed"    
    elif verb[-2:] == "ay":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "y":
        ed = verb[:-1] + "ied"
    elif verb[-1] == "r":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "l":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-2:] == "ip":
        ed = verb + "ped"
    elif verb[-1] == "p":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "e":
        ed = verb + "d"
    elif verb[-1] == "t":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "d":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "x":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "w":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "c":
        ed = verb + "ked"
    elif not is_vowel(verb[-1]) and is_vowel(verb[-2]) and not is_vowel(verb[-3]):
        ed = verb + verb[-1] + "ed"
    else:
        ed = verb + "ed"
    return ed

def ed2(verb):
    if verb in modal_verbs:
        ed = verb
    elif verb in irreg_verbs:
        ed = irreg_verbs[verb][1]
    elif verb[-2:] == "oy":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-2:] == "ay":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "y":
        ed = verb[:-1] + "ied"
    elif verb[-1] == "e":
        ed = verb + "d"
    elif verb[-1] == "r":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "l":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-2:] == "ip":
        ed = verb + "ped"
    elif verb[-1] == "p":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "t":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "d":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "x":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "w":
        ed = verb + "ed"
    elif verb[-1] == "c":
        ed = verb + "ked"
    elif not is_vowel(verb[-1]) and is_vowel(verb[-2]) and not is_vowel(verb[-3]):
        ed = verb + verb[-1] + "ed"
    else:
        ed = verb + "ed"
    return ed

def is_vowel(letter):
    if letter in "aeiou":
        return True
    else:
        return False

modal_verbs = ["shall", "should", "will", "would", "may", "might", "can", "could", "must"]

irreg_verbs = {
    "arise": ["arose", "arisen"], 
    "awake": ["awakened/awoke", "awakened/awoken"], 
    "backslide": ["backslid", "backslidden/backslid"],
    "be": ["was/were", "been"], 
    "bear": ["bore", "born/borne"], 
    "beat": ["beat", "beaten/beat"], 
    "become": ["became", "become"],
    "begin": ["began", "begun"], "bend": ["bent", "bent"],
 	"bet": ["bet/betted", "bet/betted"],
 	"bid": ["bid/bade", "bidden"],
 	"bind": ["bound", "bound"],
 	"bite": ["bit", "bitten"],
 	"bleed": ["bled", "bled"],

}

while True:
    verb = input("Enter an English verb ('q' to quit): ")
    verb = verb.lower()
    if verb == "q":
        break 
    else:
        print("gerund: " + ing(verb))
        print("third p. sg.: " + thirdps(verb))
        print("past simple: " + ed1(verb))
        print("past participle: " + ed2(verb))
